Tours & Excursions

On discovery tour in Bremerhaven

Whether with a bus, a ship or by foot, with or without a guide - In Bremerhaven and its surrounding areas there is much to be explored. Your main interest is historical topics? Or you would like to learn everything about fish? You are eager to experience Bremerhaven from the water? Surely you will find just the right thing under "Tours and Outings". Be inspired by the offered possibilities.
We look forward to greet you and are glad to assist you!
